#include<iostream>
#define MOD 8388608
int main()
{
int t,n,total,f,s;
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--)
{
	s=1;
	f=0;
	scanf("%d",&n);
	if(n>=23)
	{
		printf("8388607\n");
		continue;
	}
	else{
	for(int i=n;i>0;i--)
	{
		s=(1<<i);
		s=s*(i)*(i+1)/4;
		f=f+s;
		if(f>=MOD) f=f%MOD;
	}
	printf("%d\n",f);
	}
}

return 0;
}
